chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A F G B : Type) (f1 : F -> B) (f2 : A -> F) (g1 : G -> B) (g2 : A -> G) (e : env A), (forall d : A, f1 (f2 d) = g1 (g2 d)) -> map f1 (map f2 e) = map g1 (map g2 e)

Premises:
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> env A -> list (option B)
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I {TA TX AA AF
ZMicromega.F = fun (acc : BinNums.positive) (f : EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1) => BinPos.Pos.max acc (ZMicromega.max_var BinNums.xH (fst f)) : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1 -> BinNums.positive Arguments ZMicromega.F _%positive_scope
map_map_fuse : forall (A B C : Type) (f : B -> C) (g : A -> B) (h : A -> C) (e : env A), (forall d : A, f (g d) = h d) -> map f (map g e) = map h e
map_raw_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (e : env A), map f (raw_insert x None e) = raw_insert x None (map f e)
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
lookup_map_some_reverse : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (b : B) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x (map f e) = Some b -> exists a : A, lookup x e = Some a /\ b = f a
lookup_map_none : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = None -> lookup x (map f e) = None
lookup_map_some : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = Some a -> lookup x (map f e) = Some (f a)
map_nth_error : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), nth_error l n = Some d -> nth_error (List.map f l) n = Some (f d)
fold : forall A B : Type, (option A -> B -> B) -> env A -> B -> B
List.map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
option_map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> option A -> option B
map_empty : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B), map f (empty A) = empty B
RingMicromega.map_option : forall A B : Type, (A -> option B) -> option A -> option B
Tauto.is_cnf_ff_inv : forall (Term' Annot : Type) (f1 : Tauto.cnf Term' Annot), Tauto.is_cnf_ff f1 = true -> f1 = Tauto.cnf_ff Term' Annot
Tauto.is_cnf_tt_inv : forall (Term' Annot : Type) (f1 : Tauto.cnf Term' Annot), Tauto.is_cnf_tt f1 = true -> f1 = Tauto.cnf_tt Term' Annot
ssrfun.pcomp : forall A B C : Type, (B -> option A) -> (C -> option B) -> C -> option A
option_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : option A -> Set), (forall a : A, P (Some a)) -> P None -> forall o : option A, P o
option_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : option A -> SProp), (forall a : A, P (Some a)) -> P None -> forall o : option A, P o
option_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : option A -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (Some a)) -> P None -> forall o : option A, P o
option_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : option A -> Type), (forall a : A, P (Some a)) -> P None -> forall o : option A, P o
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
lookup_insert_bingo : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x = y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = o
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
fold_left : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> A) -> list B -> A -> A
insert_insert : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), k <= s -> raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (1 + s) b (raw_insert k a e)
empty_eq_insert : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : A) (e : env A), empty A = insert x o e -> False
lookup_insert_old : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x > y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup (x - 1) e
Tauto.or_cnf_opt_correct : forall (Env Term' Annot : Type) (unsat : Term' -> bool) (deduce : Term' -> Term' -> option Term') (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop), (forall (env : Env) (d : Term'), eval' env d \/ ~ eval' env d) -> (forall t : Term', unsat t = true -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> False) -> (forall t t' u : Term', deduce t t' = Some u -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> eval' env t' -> eval' env u) -> forall (env : Env) (f f' : Tauto.cnf Term' Annot), Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (Tauto.or_cnf_opt unsat deduce f f') < -> Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (Tauto.or_cnf unsat deduce f f')
Tauto.or_clause_correct : forall (Env Term' Annot : Type) (unsat : Term' -> bool) (deduce : Term' -> Term' -> option Term') (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop), (forall (env : Env) (d : Term'), eval' env d \/ ~ eval' env d) -> (forall t : Term', unsat t = true -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> False) -> (forall t t' u : Term', deduce t t' = Some u -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> eval' env t' -> eval' env u) -> forall (cl cl' : Tauto.clause Term' Annot) (env : Env), Tauto.eval_opt_clause eval' env (Tauto.or_clause unsat deduce cl cl') < -> Tauto.eval_clause eval' env cl \/ Tauto.eval_clause eval' env cl'
Tauto.or_cnf_correct : forall (Env Term' Annot : Type) (unsat : Term' -> bool) (deduce : Term' -> Term' -> option Term') (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop), (forall (env : Env) (d : Term'), eval' env d \/ ~ eval' env d) -> (forall t : Term', unsat t = true -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> False) -> (forall t t' u : Term', deduce t t' = Some u -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> eval' env t' -> eval' env u) -> forall (env : Env) (f f' : Tauto.cnf Term' Annot), Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (Tauto.or_cnf unsat deduce f f') < -> Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env f \/ Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env f'
Tauto.or_clause_cnf_correct : forall (Env Term' Annot : Type) (unsat : Term' -> bool) (deduce : Term' -> Term' -> option Term') (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop), (forall (env : Env) (d : Term'), eval' env d \/ ~ eval' env d) -> (forall t : Term', unsat t = true -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> False) -> (forall t t' u : Term', deduce t t' = Some u -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> eval' env t' -> eval' env u) -> forall (env : Env) (t : Tauto.clause Term' Annot) (f : Tauto.cnf Term' Annot), Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (Tauto.or_clause_cnf unsat deduce t f) < -> Tauto.eval_clause eval' env t \/ Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env f
Tauto.tauto_checker_sound : forall (Env Term Term' Annot : Type) (unsat : Term' -> bool) (deduce : Term' -> Term' -> option Term') (normalise negate : Term -> Annot -> Tauto.cnf Term' Annot) (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop), (forall (env : Env) (d : Term'), eval' env d \/ ~ eval' env d) -> (forall t : Term', unsat t = true -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> False) -> (forall t t' u : Term', deduce t t' = Some u -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> eval' env t' -> eval' env u) -> forall eval : Env -> Term -> Prop, (forall (env : Env) (t : Term) (tg : Annot), Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (normalise t tg) -> eval env t) ->...-> forall env : Env, Tauto.eval_f (fun x : Prop => x) (eval env) t
Tauto.xcnf_correct : forall (Env Term Term' Annot : Type) (unsat : Term' -> bool) (deduce : Term' -> Term' -> option Term') (normalise negate : Term -> Annot -> Tauto.cnf Term' Annot) (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop), (forall (env : Env) (d : Term'), eval' env d \/ ~ eval' env d) -> (forall t : Term', unsat t = true -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> False) -> (forall t t' u : Term', deduce t t' = Some u -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> eval' env t' -> eval' env u) -> forall eval : Env -> Term -> Prop, (forall (env : Env) (t : Term) (tg : Annot), Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (normalise t tg) -> eval env t) ->...-> Tauto.eval_f (fun x : Prop => x) (eval env) (if pol then f else Tauto.N f)
insert_nil : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), insert x a e = nil -> False
lookup_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A), lookup (S x) e = lookup x (tl e)
Tauto.collect_annot = fun TA TX AA AF : Type => fix collect_annot (f : Tauto.GFormula) : list AA := match f with | Tauto.A _ a => a :: nil | Tauto.N f0 => collect_annot f0 | Tauto.Cj f1 f2 | Tauto.D f1 f2 | Tauto.I f1 _ f2 => collect_annot f1 ++ collect_annot f2 | _ => nil end : forall TA TX AA AF : Type, Tauto.GFormula -> list AA Arguments Tauto.collect_annot {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope
raw_insert : forall A : Type, nat -> option A -> env A -> env A
Inductive prod (A B : Type) : Type := pair : A -> B -> A * B Arguments prod (_ _)%type_scope Arguments pair {A B}%type_scope

```coq
intros A F G B f1 f2 g1 g2 e H.
unfold map. induction e as [|d e' IH].
- reflexivity.
- simpl. rewrite H. rewrite IH. reflexivity.
Qed.
```
